my fav rap song..

As much as I like "Pass the Mic", I say Dr. Dre did the best job with the sample. The Beastie Boys have other instrumental/samples that overshadows the one at hand which makes it sound too chaotic and busy (not necessarily a bad thing). Dre's job is just too funky to be touched!
That "real (word I'm not allowed to say because I'm a white guy)s don't die" is going to be really black comedy 50 years from now...
